about.title: WHO IS FOGSIFT
about.name: Christopher Tavolazzi
about.bio: Software developer. Former realtor, brewery tour guide, journalist, author, and Eagle Scout. He's lived in a van across America's national parks and played music on three continents. Whatever you're stuck on, he can probably find someone who knows how to fix it.

main.name: Focus Session
main.description: A full-on research squad (me + AI + friends + network) focused on your submission for up to an hour. Worth way more than $20, kept low so anyone can access it.
main.note: Your $20 adds your problem to the queue. $20 is the accessibility filter that keeps it serious and keeps it open to anyone who can get a job at McDonald's. You receive a PDF write-up and a video response. A video may or may not be published. Submissions may be used for other purposes, including marketing. Maybe we solve it. Maybe we don't. Either way, you walk away with something.
